resources.string:
"No bookmarks

Use the Edinburgh Bus Tracker app to add bookmarks first

"No bookmarks

Press the 'map' button above to view a map of stops.

From the map touch a stop on the map to display times, and then press menu to add a bookmark."

"Changes:
 * Update bus data automatically.
 * Deal with crash in nearby stops if a bookmark is no longer valid.
 * Add map zoom-out when filtering services.
 * Serverside: Missing services (e.g. X48) should be visible on the map again.
 "
